Checks to see if a specific event is defined for an object. Optionally, if a callback is given, this method will check to see if that callback is defined for the specified event.

event
The event to check.
callback
A specific callback for an event to check.
var obj = new Falcon.Object(); var alert_function = function() { alert("Hello World") }; var foo_function = function() { alert("Foo Bar") }; obj.on("alert", alert_function); console.log( obj.has("alert") ); // => true console.log( obj.has("click") ); // => false console.log( obj.has("alert", alert_function) ); // => true console.log( obj.has("alert", foo_function) ); // => false
